13  package net.sf.oval.internal;
14  
15  import java.util.HashMap;
16  import java.util.Map;
17  import java.util.Map.Entry;
18  
19  import net.sf.oval.internal.util.Assert;
20  import net.sf.oval.internal.util.StringUtils;
21  import net.sf.oval.logging.Logger;
22  import net.sf.oval.logging.LoggerFactory;
23  import net.sf.oval.logging.LoggerFactoryJDKImpl;
24  
25  /**
26   * @author Sebastian Thomschke
27   */
28  public final class Log
29  {
30  	private static LoggerFactory loggerFactory = new LoggerFactoryJDKImpl();
31  
32  	/* cannot use CollectionFactoryHolder.getFactory().createMap(32) here, since 
33  	 * the collection factory uses the Log itself which is not yet initialized
34  	 */
35  	private static final Map<String, Log> LOG_REGISTRY = new HashMap<String, Log>(32);
36  
37  	public static Log getLog(final Class< ? > clazz) throws IllegalArgumentException
38  	{
39  		Assert.notNull("clazz", clazz);
40  
41  		return getLog(clazz.getName());
42  	}
43  
44  	public static synchronized Log getLog(final String name) throws IllegalArgumentException
45  	{
46  		Assert.notNull("name", name);
47  
48  		Log log = LOG_REGISTRY.get(name);
49  		if (log == null) log = new Log(loggerFactory.createLogger(name));
50  		return log;
51  	}
52  
53  	/**
54  	 * @return the loggerFactory
55  	 */
56  	public static LoggerFactory getLoggerFactory()
57  	{
58  		synchronized (LOG_REGISTRY)
59  		{
60  			return loggerFactory;
61  		}
62  	}
63  
64  	/**
65  	 * @param loggerFactory the loggerFactory to set
66  	 */
67  	public static void setLoggerFactory(final LoggerFactory loggerFactory) throws IllegalArgumentException
68  	{
69  		Assert.notNull("loggerFactory", loggerFactory);
70  
71  		synchronized (LOG_REGISTRY)
72  		{
73  			Log.loggerFactory = loggerFactory;
74  			for (final Entry<String, Log> entry : LOG_REGISTRY.entrySet())
75  				entry.getValue().setLogger(loggerFactory.createLogger(entry.getKey()));
76  		}
77  	}
78  
79  	private Logger logger;
80  
81  	/**
82  	 * private constructor to avoid external instantiation
83  	 */
84  	private Log(final Logger logger)
85  	{
86  		setLogger(logger);
87  	}
88  
89  	public void debug(final String msg)
90  	{
91  		logger.debug(msg);
92  	}
93  
94  	public void debug(final String msgFormat, final Object arg1)
95  	{
96  		if (logger.isDebug())
97  			logger.debug(StringUtils.replaceAll(msgFormat, "{1}", arg1 == null ? "null" : arg1.toString()));
98  	}
99  
100 	public void debug(final String msgFormat, final Object arg1, final Object arg2)
101 	{
102 		if (logger.isDebug())
103 		{
104 			String msg = StringUtils.replaceAll(msgFormat, "{1}", arg1 == null ? "null" : arg1.toString());
105 			msg = StringUtils.replaceAll(msg, "{2}", arg2 == null ? "null" : arg2.toString());
106 
107 			logger.debug(msg);
108 		}
109 	}
110 
111 	public void debug(final String msgFormat, final Object arg1, final Object arg2, final Object arg3)
112 	{
113 		if (logger.isDebug())
114 		{
115 			String msg = StringUtils.replaceAll(msgFormat, "{1}", arg1 == null ? "null" : arg1.toString());
116 			msg = StringUtils.replaceAll(msg, "{2}", arg2 == null ? "null" : arg2.toString());
117 			msg = StringUtils.replaceAll(msg, "{3}", arg3 == null ? "null" : arg3.toString());
118 
119 			logger.debug(msg);
120 		}
121 	}
122 
123 	public void debug(final String msgFormat, final Object arg1, final Object arg2, final Throwable t)
124 	{
125 		if (logger.isDebug())
126 		{
127 			String msg = StringUtils.replaceAll(msgFormat, "{1}", arg1 == null ? "null" : arg1.toString());
128 			msg = StringUtils.replaceAll(msg, "{2}", arg2 == null ? "null" : arg2.toString());
129 
130 			logger.debug(msg, t);
131 		}
132 	}

281 
282 	private void setLogger(final Logger logger)
283 	{
284 		Assert.notNull("logger", logger);
285 
286 		this.logger = logger;
287 	}
288 
289 	public void trace(final String msg)
290 	{
291 		logger.debug(msg);
292 	}
